titleStmt.title: Saint Petersburg, The National Library of Russia (Российская национaльная библиотeка), Marcel 15

respStmt.resp: Edited by Michael Marx in collaboration with Tobias J. Jocham et. al. TEI version created by Yasmin Faghihi and Huw Jones

msIdentifier.repository: The National Library of Russia (Российская национaльная библиотeка) , Saint Petersburg

summary.p: 10 fol. on parchment; Shelfmark: Marcel 15; Qurʾānic Text: Q 25:16-27:89; 25 lines per page; Dimensions: 305/310 x 370mm; Script style: Umayyad.
The fragments Marcel 11, Marcel 13 (NLR) and maybe Arabe 330 (c) (BNF) belong to the same manuscript.

This entry was created on the basis of the information made available by Valery V. Polosin (1939-2014), without use of manuscript images. Therefore, the exact distribution of the Qurʾānic passages across the manuscript pages is unknown to us, and all the passages are shown as belonging to fol. 1. The catalogue entry by Polosin contains the following information:
"Marcel 15

10 fol. 305/310×370 mm (1.2). Support: parchment from thin and transparent to almost thick and semitransparent, fragile, “battered”, of yellowish color (especially on the flesh side). Writing material: brown ink of different density.
Quires: one full quire, I H1F H2F H3F H4F H5F/ F6H F7H F8H F9H F10H , all are bifolia.

Text layout: 25 lines, 275×230 mm (1.19). Ruling: absent; there are traces of hard-point ruling for the heapiece on f. 3r. Script: Umayyad. Diacritics: small diagonal dashes in the same ink as the main text. Vocalization: red round dots.
Verse markers: for individual verses – diagonal dashes in the same ink as the main text (type1.1.1); for the groups of 10 verses – double circle in red and black ink (type 1.A.I).
Surah titles are written in red ink:
Surah 26 – فاتحة سورة طسم الشعراء وهي ماتين و سبع وعشرون اية (fol. 3r);
Surah 27 – فاتحة سورة النمل وهي اربع وسبعون اية (fol. 7v).
Stitching: threads are preserved in the punctures; traces of brown substance (leather?) remained from the back of the binding.
Traces of old conservation: in some places the text has been overwritten.

Defects: stains, traces of moisture, the edges of folios are torn, the parchment is crumbling in the upper left corner and in some places is destroyed by aggressive ink; ink has peeled of in some places.

Attached materials: f. I is a paper leaf with the description of the manuscript and excerpts from the Hinkelman edition, in brown ink: 10 f. 25 lig. h. 29 c / long. 23 c/ ½. 2 <…>; on the verso side is a fragment of a French article, brown ink.
Old accession number: A. 15 (according to Langlois’ inventory).
Fol. 1r–3r. Surah 25, verses 17(16) – 77(77)*. Incipit: [وعْدًا] مسؤولاً * ويَوْمَ .
Fol. 3r–7v. Surah 26.
Fol. 7v–10v. Surah 27, verses 1(1) – 91(89). Explicit: يومئذٍ [آمِنون *] .
Other fragments of the same manuscript: Marcel 11, Marcel 13 (NLR); Arabe 330c(?). (BNF)."
